data.title: âLaugh Now, Cry Later on Apple Podcasts
data.meta_description: A podcast made for shit talkers.
data.text:
LNCL IS BACK! Today we have Alicia Rector, a recent cripple and unlicensed therapist to our host Nik. Alicia called in on Zoom for our return and we catch up on whats been goin on.

This week we have our good friend Henry Caskey on the show. Henry is a singer/song writer and we get into his time living in Portland, wine tasting notes, getting your balls checked, karaoke and more. Enjoy!

We are back!! Nik is back in the studio and ready to make you Laugh Now, and Cry Later. Today, Nik is joined by his new co-host Naomi Parrilla, they get into what quarantine has done for Naomi's alcohol tolerance, the Free Britney movement, and BLM documentaries. Enjoy!

Nik and Cooper are joined by Kyle Salao and Ruben Flores, the hosts of the hilarious show The Scrub on YouTube. Kyle is a fitness enthusiast and personal trainer with a Bachelors in Kinesiology, and Ruben is a sports announcer and voice of the Netflix Original documentary series Last Chance U: Season 5. On this episode, Kyle explains why he hates instagram influencers, Ruben inspires us to chase our dreams, and Nik and Cooper just talk shit the whole time. Enjoy!

On this episode of the podcast, Cooper tells the infamous Modesto burrito story, Nik bends a frying pan, and they finish off the episode reviewing the final episodes of The Jefferey Epstein Documentary parts 3&4. Orale!!

Nik sits down with Cooper to review the second episode of The Filthy Rich Documentary on Netflix. They also reminisce on being good at accents, why Nik wears sunglasses indoors, and Cooper talks about his toilet time...
